About Me

I have a passion for making beautiful responsive websites, skateboarding and being goofy.

Things I Enjoy..

After a very long hiatus away from my true passion, I found my way back to designing and developing websites. I've become obsessed with the things we can do today compared to 10 years ago, from responsive design to functionality, modern websites are truly a work of art. Websites, web apps and mobile applications can open new possibilities for businesses and entrepreneurs. Today i am blessed to have access to free programming education and learning resources online that nobody had access to ten years ago.

This is my dog Daisy. She is a 100% purebred Beagle. There are two types of Beagles there are Beagles that don't exceed 13 inches in height at the shoulder and beagles that stand 13-15 inches in height at he shoulder. Daisy is 14 inches at the shoulder and still growing. She has a very wild personality and has many friends at the local dog park.

In my free time you can find me at the local parks hiking and exploring nature. My favorite parks in Lakeland are Fletcher Park, Loyce E. Harpe Park, Circle B Bar Reserve, and Bonnet Springs Park. I also like to expolore local car meets, restaurants and the many beaches near by.
